bottle.name: 2014 Parallus California White Wine Blend
bottle.short_tasting_note: The wine shows lovely aromas of white peach, melon and honeysuckle and is medium-bodied and round on the palate.
bottle.tasting_note: Lovely aromatics, with notes of white peach, melon and honeysuckle. Medium bodied and round, with a nice long mouth-watering finish; this delicious white blend is great with dishes with a touch of spice like, Thai coconut shrimp curry or grilled fish tacos.
